This is your personal wellness score based on your body composition Analysis, Body vitals, Blood reports and counselling.It simplifies the health status of an individual into just one number which is a scientifically calculated number from 1 (low) to 100 (high).Health Score is based on who you are (body), how you feel (mind) and how you live (lifestyle) Reescore is designed by highly qualified Nutrition Experts who have designed Algorithm to calculate the PWS( Personal Wellness Score) taking into account your BMI, Body Composition Analysis, Body Vitals, Blood reports, various Health parameters, Body Types, Body shapes, Medical Conditions, Physical Activity, Lifestyles, Food intake, Food portion sizes, eating habits and pattern, Sleep, Smoking Alcohol, stress. \n\n It simplifies your health status into just one number which is scientifically calculated number from 1 (low) to 100 (High)• \n\n It is a score based on who you are (body), how you feel (mind) and how you live (lifestyle). Interpretation Are you ready to start your\njourney of thousand miles which\nbegins with a single step? REENGAGE: login your details and set your profile information. REEASSES: Know your current Health Body vitals Pathology Test Data not found REESCORE: It is an overall rating of the quality of your lifestyle, nutrition, sleep patterns, hydration levels and your mind. Higher the score means you are following holistic approach to optimize your Health. Reeevaluate:Detailed questionnaire for your reecoach to understand better and help you achieve your health goals. Reetest: Important Blood tests to know your body vitals. Get a Reecoach: COUNSELLING ASSESSMENT ASSIGN ACHIEVABLE TARGETS. Get customized Reeplans Lifestyle Plans Nutrition Plans Food Plans Supplement Plans Cheat Plans Reeports - Personal wellness REPORT Reengage: Start logging in your activity/Nutrition/Water/Sleep and mood of the day. Reevitalise: Track progress of your Health Reefocus: Get instant Reminders/Notifications for better adherence with constant monitoring and motivations Reestore:Buy online foods,products and superfoods View More While planning to move for Pathology Test, please make sure you at fasting state for 12 hours. Sometimes it is best to SMILE and move on Add Medicine Edit Medicine Medicine Name Frequency Set Your Health Goal Here Health & Wellness Weight Control Weight Gain Easy Monitoring of body parameters Select Your Body Shape Pear Apple Enter Your Weight & Height Weight (kg) Height (in cms) REEcoach //shared preference coming_from

Pear Shape:A pear body shape is one where most of your weight is situated around your thighs, hips and buttocks and you have slim arms and shoulders and a bust that is smaller than your hips.

Apple Shape: If you have an apple-shaped body, then your body is "top heavy," meaning you have a wide torso, broad shoulders, and a full bust, waist, and upper back.

Mesomorph Body:Mesomorphs have a large bone structure, large muscles and an athletic physique.

Ectomorph Body: Ectomorphs have a light build with small joints and lean muscle.

Endomorph Body:Endomorphs have a shorter build with thick arms and legs and gain fat very easily.

Sedentary:Spending most of the day sitting and not doing any intentional Physical activity for atleast 30 minutes every day.

Mildly Active: Spending good Part of the day on your feet or exercising for about 3o minutes.

Moderately Active: Daily exercise for about 45 minutes to 1 hour or Short duration high intensity exercises for 30 minutes.

Highly Active:Spending most of the day doing heavy physical activity or engaging in 2- 4 hours of vigorous exercises.
